title: Client crashed non stop when loading into game.
body: I queued up for a rank game. Champ select was fine, but as soon as the actual game started I started to get non-stop bug splats. My client was apparently broken which cause my client to try and repair it. It would repair it, and as it was about to load into game it bug splatted again. This happened for 3 minutes until people in the game ff causing it to stop. Does Riot know about this? R.I.P. my lp.

replies.body: Same, some people said it's a NZ server thing well it's not. im in WA and i tried to fix this, but can't. how frustrating. Im trying to redownload and reinstall on my mac right now to see if it works, if it doesn't, I simply can't play this game anymore. Sad
